data.name: Vrerience - Fear of Fruits & Vegetables
data.detailed_description: In order to treat a fear of fruits and vegetables, also known as fructophobia and lachanophobia, this program allows the client to gradually get used to these food items. The therapist has control over a number of options. They can drop a variety of fruits or vegetables in a fruit bowl in front of the client. The bowl can be moved closer and further away from the client, and all fruits and vegetables in the scene can be removed in an instant. With most fruits and vegetables, there’s an option to create a cut or opened version of the item. Currently uncuttable items the therapist can choose from are: Cucumber, Garlic, and Onion. The available, cuttable items are: Apple, Banana, Kiwi, Melon, Orange, and Strawberry.
data.about_the_game: In order to treat a fear of fruits and vegetables, also known as fructophobia and lachanophobia, this program allows the client to gradually get used to these food items. The therapist has control over a number of options. They can drop a variety of fruits or vegetables in a fruit bowl in front of the client. The bowl can be moved closer and further away from the client, and all fruits and vegetables in the scene can be removed in an instant. With most fruits and vegetables, there’s an option to create a cut or opened version of the item. Currently uncuttable items the therapist can choose from are: Cucumber, Garlic, and Onion. The available, cuttable items are: Apple, Banana, Kiwi, Melon, Orange, and Strawberry.
data.short_description: A VRERIENCE program meant for use in the professional treatment of clients with Fear of Fruits & Vegetables.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3GB Video RAM (e.g. GeForce GTX 1060 3GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Oculus Rift/S + Touch required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9700K 3.6GHz or AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Graphics: 6GB Video RAM (e.g. GeForce GTX 1060 6GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Oculus Rift/S + Touch required
